extension.description: [B]This is a Modded version of [COLOR lime]ResolveURL[/COLOR] by jsergio and gujal, it is not an official release, no support is offered for this version.[/B] Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon.
